summary: The Dragonborn DLC added an epic new shout: Dragon Aspect. But there was a hitch: it doesn't work well for Stealthy characters. This mod aims to fix that, by removing the ambient sound.
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][size=5]The Dragonborn DLC added an epic new shout: Dragon Aspect. But there was a hitch: it doesn't work well for Stealthy characters. This mod aims to fix that, by removing the ambient sound.

This is a [b][color=orange]Dragonborn DLC-requiring[/color][/b] mod.

Thanks to [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3638916]mincartoon[/url][/b] for kindly making a video featuring some gameplay using this mod:
[center][youtube]_nWEi50khTU[/youtube][/center]

Credits go to [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/416631]daventry[/url][/b] for the idea.

As always, comments and thoughts are appreciated. And don't forget to check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31809][b]Brelyna Maryon Redone[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31693][b]Explosive Unarmed Punches[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32933][b]Fists of the Mage - Unarmed Gameplay Enhanced[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28565][b]Ice Form Weapons[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33160][b]The Golden Touch - New Spells and Effect Shaders[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31744][b]The Hulk Follower[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28670][b]Weapon Enchantments Redone[/b][/url][/size][/font]
author: BrotherBob with daventry
